column5: Hello  Just wanted to show some pics of the great outinfing we had on Sun  and tues   Had the river to ourselfs,  probally 4-7 KM ofgood water.     We all went into the high teens each day and probally a hundred small guys between 4-10 inches,  1 fish keep due to bleeding...  To many pics to post here is just a handful...     This one went to the dinner table ( bleeding)        More to come  Thanks  Dave
nice work! sounds like a couple awesome days
Thank you for the great report and pics Dave.  Is that the stretch that you were telling me about ?  I've got a salmon trip set up for the 16'th let me know if you're interested
great pictures, always looking forward to your reports.
Some great results...water conditions look primo!  Gotta love this time of year, roll up the sleeves, sunburn and high-flying trout
Excellent couple of days Dave and some beautiful steel!!!  congratulations  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Great pictures Dmasse...Certainly a fantastic couple of days out on the water
